agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Licensing & Administrative Procedures TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E2.028 CHAIR: Rep. Tracy King HB 78 Raymond Relating to local option elections to legalize or prohibit the operation of eight-liners; imposing fees; creating criminal offenses; increasing criminal penalties. HJR 18 Raymond Proposing a constitutional amendment authorizing local option elections to legalize or prohibit the operation of eight-liners. HB 892 Kuempel | et al. Relating to county regulation of game rooms. HB 1385 King, Tracy O. Relating to the regulation of industrialized housing and buildings. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
